Contact

Before submitting a request, please review the links below

  • Would you like to Suggest a Dataset?

  • Looking to make a Public Information Request?
    Please note: All government information is presumed to be available to the public, although certain exceptions may apply. You may request public records online by clicking here

  • Do you have questions about a particular dataset? On the Open Data portal you have a great opportunity to contact the dataset owner, the City Publisher and Liaison who would know best about the dataset. learn more

  • Looking to use open data as part of your application or your business? Build something awesome using open data.

  • Curious about our Terms of Use and Licensing? Read the Terms of Use for the data on the City of Austin Open Data Portal.

  • Take a tour of the Open Data Portal

  • Join us on our blog, knowledge base and collaboration platform designed to engage data users in open, transparent knowledge sharing.
